pages.text: $(bold)CatLeap$() is a skill used to jump and cling to top of walls,fence or etc.$(br)This is said to be one of basic skills of parkour.$(br)Traceurs absorb an impact of landing with movement of legs.$(br2)In this mod, this is implemented as a long jump. Please careful with the cool time.

pages.title: How to Use
pages.text: $(bold)1.$() Do $(l:parcool:actions/fast_run)Fast Run$()$(br)$(bold)2.$() Sneak quickly$(br)$(bold)3.$() Cancel sneaking quickly$(br2)I recommend also using $(l:parcool:actions/cling_to_cliff)Cling To Cliff$().
